items.sentence: First, spread the puzzle pieces out on a table.
Is it bad to eat more than three bananas a day?
My carry-on luggage is over the allowed weight.
There's no way that I can do what Tom is doing.
Everyone promised to faithfully obey the rules.
Would it be OK if I asked your a few questions?
Why didn't you try to stop Tom from doing that?
You just have to stay there and not do a thing.
My mother asked me what time I'd get back home.
Tom asked me if I wanted to eat lunch with him.
